sen.e: At the time of his funeral in 1923, his son, Takema, was blamed by police because he carried the dead body of his strict father to the cemetery only covered with mushiro on straws.

sen.e: After my death, I want to be treated in the same way with people of former feudal domain who had been neglected in the castletown.'
